DOC.detailed_description: Preeclampsia major cause maternal mortality . When preeclampsia present prior thirty-four week gestation , expectant management standard practice stable patient goal extend pregnancy therefore decrease risk adverse outcome premature neonate . Our aim ass efficacy Sildenafil , phosphodiesterase inhibitor , versus placebo , addition expectant management , treatment preterm preeclampsia prolong pregnancy .
